definition: to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Too many magazines like to feature sleek models on the cover.
sentences.chinese: 太多的杂志喜欢用时尚模特儿作封面。

sentences.english: Oh, and tell therm we want it small enough to fit on a book cover.
sentences.chinese: 哦，告诉他们要小一点，要能够放在书的封面上。

sentences.english: The New York magazine is no stranger to controversial covers.
sentences.chinese: 纽约杂志对争议性封面司空见惯。

sentences.english: That's true.And more Chinese step on the cover of "Times".
sentences.chinese: 没错，而且越来越多的中国人登上了时代周刊封面。

sentences.english: A layout of an image to be printed such as a book cover .
sentences.chinese: 杂凑而成的东西将要印刷的图案设计，如书的封面。

sentences.english: Jike quietly contemplates a picturesque scene on a magazine page hung on the wall;
sentences.chinese: 尼西静静地凝视着墙上挂着的杂志封面上独特的风景。

sentences.english: Let's look--just to begin with, if you brought your books--let's look at the cover of this book.
sentences.chinese: 首先，如果你们带了书，先看看这本书的封面。

sentences.english: A patent-pending hinge secures your Kindle to the cover.
sentences.chinese: 正在申请专利的铰链作保你点燃的封面。

sentences.english: Translations in 10 languages and an album has been released.
sentences.chinese: 并且将封面翻译成10国语言，全世界出版发行。

sentences.english: For the first time the cover is a wrap-around.
sentences.chinese: 封面和封底的图画是连在一起的，这还是第一次。

sentences.english: its cover photo is one of a pair of eyes staring through a rectangle cut in black fabric.
sentences.chinese: 封面图片是蒙在长方形黑色纱巾的一双眼睛。

sentences.english: Her smiling face has often been caricatured on the front covers of magazines.
sentences.chinese: 她的笑脸常在杂志的封面上被画成漫画。

sentences.english: Her portrait appears on the front cover to that magazine .
sentences.chinese: 她的肖像刊在那份杂志的封面上。

sentences.english: Famous photographer Annie Leibovitz took the photo for the release of this single on the same day Lennon was murdered.
sentences.chinese: 单曲封面的照片就是在列侬被杀当天拍摄的。

sentences.english: Your facelooked like the cover of the magazine. My head spin.
sentences.chinese: 妾讶君面尤类杂志封面。

sentences.english: The cover star of this issue is Justin, my favorite singer.
sentences.chinese: 这期的封面明星是贾斯汀，我最喜欢的歌手。

definition: the back cover of a book
page of a publication (e.g. newspaper or website)/printing space (reserved for some content)/page layout
photobook (loanword from Japanese), generally sexy portraits of an actress or model
